name: Hot Black Bean Dip Wraps

ingredients.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix  or Red Garlic Topper Blend
Chili Seasoning or Chipotle Aioli Mix

preparation:
1. Dice tomatoes. Stir in salsa mix, lime juice and cilantro, if desired.
  2. Meanwhile, in a food processor, combine beans, water, dip mix, and lime juice. Blend until smooth.
  3. Spread Black Bean Dip on each tortilla. Top with salsa, greens and cheese. For each wrap, fold two sides of wrap over filling, then roll tightly, ending seam side down.
  4. Place 4 wraps in bottom of Multipurpose Steamer. Sprinkle with extra cheese, if desired. Gently place Multipurpose Tray on top; arrange remaining wraps on tray and sprinkle with more cheese, if desired. Microwave until warm, for 1-2 min.
tips: Have extra time? Line a Sheet Pan with a Sheet Pan Liner. Place wraps seam-side down on pan and toast for 10 mins at 350Â° F.
